detail.detailText: BPCOR-6135: A fault was not handled in the process scope; Fault Name is {http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable}invalidVariables; Fault Data is <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><jbi:message xmlns:sxeh="http://www.sun.com/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable/SUNExtension/ErrorHandling" type="sxeh:faultMessage" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"><jbi:part>BPCOR-6175: Invalid document &lt;?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?&gt;&lt;altaPedido xmlns="http://wsmusicapedidos/"&gt;&lt;id_clte xmlns=""&gt;1&lt;/id_clte&gt;&lt;lista_it xmlns=""&gt;&lt;cantidad&gt;2&lt;/cantidad&gt;&lt;cantidad&gt;1&lt;/cantidad&gt;&lt;/lista_it&gt;&lt;/altaPedido&gt; is assigned to AltaPedidoIn in BP instance (192.168.172.1:23e3c23b:193ad75afb0:-7bf0) at line 36 BP {http://enterprise.netbeans.org/bpel/Integrador_BPEL/integrador_BPEL}integrador_BPEL</jbi:part></jbi:message>. Sending errors for the pending requests in the process scope before terminating the process instance Caused by: BPCOR-6175: Invalid document <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><altaPedido xmlns="http://wsmusicapedidos/"><id_clte xmlns="">1</id_clte><lista_it xmlns=""><cantidad>2</cantidad><cantidad>1</cantidad></lista_it></altaPedido> is assigned to AltaPedidoIn in BP instance (192.168.172.1:23e3c23b:193ad75afb0:-7bf0) at line 36 BP {http://enterprise.netbeans.org/bpel/Integrador_BPEL/integrador_BPEL}integrador_BPEL BPCOR-6129: Line Number is 36 BPCOR-6130: Activity Name is Assign1 Caused by: Too many elements: {null}id_prod
